member.name: T:maliyuAccess2003Dll.maliyuAccess
member.summary: DLL to manipulate Microsoft Access 2003 written by maliyu.

member.name: M:maliyuAccess2003Dll.maliyuAccess.#ctor(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection)
member.summary: An OleDbConnection object represents a unique connection to a data source.Client/server database system is not supported. An instance of OleDbConnection.

member.name: M:maliyuAccess2003Dll.maliyuAccess.QueryWholeDB(System.String)
member.summary: Search the string in whole database
member.param: search string. If string is null or empty, then exception will be thrown out
member.returns: search result store as dataset since search string could be exist in multi tables and multi records in the database

member.name: M:maliyuAccess2003Dll.maliyuAccess.GetDBRecord(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: get record from whole database based on field name and field content
member.param: Table field name. If database does not contain it, then null will be return
Table field content. If database does not contain it, then null will be return
member.returns: It may return multi table and record
